name: Nepali Date
author: govinda khatiwada

sections.description:
Nepali Date is a simple widget that displays the nepali date. The plugin is relatively easy to setup.
Added shortcode to display date in posts and pages Use Shortcode [nepalidate] to display in post and pages.

Use

After activating this plugin, simply visit the site and it should be visible in your sidebar.

License

sections.installation:
This plugin is installed just like any other WordPress plugin.
More [detailed installation instructions]
(https://codex.wordpress.org/Managing_Plugins#Installing_Plugins “Installing Plugins – WordPress Codex”) are available on the WordPress Codex.

  1. Use Shortcode [nepalidate] to display in post and pages.
  2. Download Nepali Date
  3. Extract nepalidate.php
  4. Upload this file to to ../wp-contents/plugins/
  5. Activate the plugin in Dashboard > Plugins
  6. Drag and drop drom widget area.
  7. Enjoy. And then consider donating
sections.faq:
What does this plugin do?

The Nepali Date plugin generates a basic XHTML with printing nepali date on the sidebar.

short_description: Nepali Date is a plugin to display the current nepali date on your website.
